mapper.sql: shs.ht_signature_id, shs.signature_id, shs.signature_code, shs.material_id, shs.supplier_id, shs.`status`, shs.remark, shs.org_id, shs.create_user_id, shs.create_time, shs.modified_user_id, shs.modified_time, shs.is_delete, shs.option1, shs.option2, shs.option3
mapper.select:
select , sm.material_code as materialCode, sm.material_name as materialName, sm.material_version as materialVersion, sm.material_desc as materialDesc, ssu.supplier_name as supplierName, u.user_name as createUserName, s.user_name as modifiedUserName, bo.organization_name from base_ht_signature shs left join base_material sm on shs.material_id=sm.material_id left join base_supplier ssu on shs.supplier_id=ssu.supplier_id left join sys_user u on shs.create_user_id=u.user_id left join sys_user s on shs.modified_user_id=s.user_id LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON shs.org_id = bo.organization_id
and date_format(shs.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and sm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and sm.material_name like CONCAT('%', #{materialName}, '%')
and shs.signature_code like CONCAT('%', #{signatureCode}, '%')
and shs.org_id=#{orgId}
order by shs.modified_time desc
